QuestData.Title: Partners in Heresy
QuestData.Description:
Rezan struggles against his bonds, but we cannot reach him.
De mogu dat Zul called here have raised a shield dat rejects my magic. Find and kill de creatures dat stand between me and my loa.
I must gather myself for de fight to come. They will know de wrath of TWO kings before dis day is done.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Soulrender Gao'tan and Darkweaver Ji'tan.
